metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3648 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2021-3530. Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2021-3530. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2021-3530 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> probably a dupe of bug 99935 probably a dupe of CVE-2021-3530 ultimately rejected by MITRE

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
